snippet.title: I'LL KILL HER ★ Trailer
snippet.description:
Platforms: PS4, PS4, Nintendo Switch, Steam, VK Play
Release date: June 29, 2023

Visual novel in the form of interactive comic book about love, life and fighting to be heard.
Coming to Steam, Playstation, Nintendo Switch and VK Play this summer.
Description:
Stephanie is ready to sacrifice everything for her dreams. She skips classes, ignores her mother, and becomes increasingly distant from her boyfriend, Brandon. All in order to prove that her photographs are art. However, the university does not think so, because shooting a “selling shot” is much more important than realizing the creative self. Stephanie is already at a boiling point when Brandon decides to leave... A deeply personal story about love, living with a mental illness and fighting to be heard.

Features:
- 10 chapters
- Art Gallery
- Dress-up minigame

Website  -  http://dillyframe.games/
